segments.text: Can you tell me something about financial aid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In your first letter , that is , when you apply for admission , you should also tell them you need their financial aid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If the aid is available , they will give you two or more application forms , One is for admission , the others are for the aid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They will tell you the aid is impossible .
segments.speaker: S2
